snippet: An Israeli man, shot while riding in a car, died Tuesday as Israel blamed Palestinian television for inciting a recent wave of violence.
abstract: Israeli man Malakhi Rosenfeld, student at Hebrew University of Jerusalem, dies after shooting attack in West Bank; Palestinian gunmen are suspected in incident.
lead_paragraph: An Israeli man, shot while riding in a car, died Tuesday as Israel blamed Palestinian television for inciting a recent wave of violence.

headline.main: Israeli Man Dies in Attack Near West Bank Settlement
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Middle East; Israel: Man Dies After West Bank Attack
